name: Eggilicious Meatloaf with Sun-dried Tomato Relish
description: An eggy twist on a family classic!

ingredients.name: Sun-Kissed Tomato Dip Mix, Bruschetta Seasoning, or Pizza Seasoning
Beef & Steak Seasoning or Chili Seasoning
lean ground beef, chicken or turkey

preparation: Combine all relish ingredients in Multipurpose Pot - 8 cup. Bring to a boil, then cover and simmer for about 15 min to thicken and let flavours blend.
For the meatloaf, whisk eggs with milk in a large bowl. Stir in breadcrumbs and seasoning. Crumble in beef and season with sea Salt. Mix well.

Divide meat mixture into 6 equal portions. Place 3 portions on Sheet Pan lined with parchment paper. Shape and flatten each into a small rectangle. Make a dip in each and place 1 hard-cooked egg in centre. Cover each with remaining meat portions and press edges together to form mini loaves.
Bake in centre of oven 30–35 min, until an instant-read thermometer registers an internal temperature of 160° F. Let stand 5 minutes, then slice.
